name: blocklife
description: An implementation of Conway's Game of Life

scripts.test: npm run build && ./node_modules/.bin/mocha test/leaf.js test/branch.js test/hash.js --no-diff --require @babel/register
scripts.test:inspect: npm run build && ./node_modules/.bin/mocha --inspect-brk test/leaf.js test/branch.js test/hash.js --no-diff --require @babel/register

author: Brendan Cannell <brendan@cannells.com>
